I assure you, C++ with opencv on the rio absolutely can work for detecting apriltags.  Depending on implementation, it may or may not be as performant as you’d like within the resource constraints of the rio, but the code will run.  This is why most teams offload that workload to a coprocessor (for example, Limelight is a commercial product for that, but it’s built on a Raspberry Pi so you could natively use that as well)\u003c/p\u003e\n\u003cp\u003eYou say “it doesn’t work”, but don’t mention “how”.
